logInOrCreateAccount: Log in or create an account to start. No email required!
invalidRegisterUsername: Username must only contain letters, numbers, or underscores
invalidRegisterPassword: Password must be 6 characters or longer
usernameAlreadyUsed: The provided username is already in use
accountNonExistent: The provided user does not exist
unmatchingPassword: The provided password does not match
registrationAgeWarning: By registering, you confirm you are of 13 years of age or older.
failedToLoadSaveData:
Failed to load save data. Please reload the page.
If this persists, please check #announcements in Discord.
failedToLoadSession:
Your session data could not be loaded.
It may be corrupted.
boyOrGirl: Are you a boy or a girl?
pauseEvolutionsQuestion:
Would you like to pause evolutions for {{pokemonName}}?
Evolutions can be re-enabled from the party screen.
disclaimerDescription:
This game is an unfinished product; it might have playability issues (including the potential loss of save data),
 change without notice, and may or may not be updated further or completed.
errorServerDown:
Oops! There was an issue contacting the server.

You may leave this window open,
the game will automatically reconnect.
noSaves: You don't have any save files on record!
tooManySaves: You have too many save files on record!
